scripts.android: npm run build && npx cap sync android && npx cap open android
scripts.ios: npm run build && npx cap sync ios && npx cap open ios
scripts.sync: npm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.sync:android: npm run build && npx cap sync android
scripts.sync:ios: npm run build && npx cap sync ios
scripts.build:apk: npm run build && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.build:apk:release: npm run build && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
